hero.title: Hello! I am
hero.description: Peruvian Systems Engineer with residence in Chile 🇵🇪🇨🇱, Senior Software Engineer with 6+ years transforming ideas into scalable technological solutions. Specialist in Artificial Intelligence, Data Science, and Enterprise Architectures. I lead technical teams, optimize systems processing millions of transactions, and develop digital transformation strategies that generate measurable ROI. Expert in Python, React, Machine Learning, and Cloud Computing with proven experience in unicorn startups and Fortune 500 companies.
hero.specialty: Enterprise Solutions Architect • Tech Lead • AI Specialist
hero.role: Senior Software Engineer • AI Expert • Data Scientist • Tech Educator
hero.pitch: I transform complex business challenges into innovative technological solutions that scale. With expertise in AI/ML, distributed architectures, and technical leadership, I have optimized systems handling +1M users, reduced operational costs by 60%, and led teams delivering world-class products.
hero.value_proposition: I combine strategic vision with exceptional technical execution to create solutions that don't just work, but transform businesses.

summary.title: EXECUTIVE SUMMARY
summary.content: Peruvian Systems Engineer with 6+ years of experience leading technical innovation in enterprise environments. Proven track record architecting scalable solutions that process millions of transactions while reducing operational costs by 60%. Expert in AI/ML implementation, microservices architecture, and technical leadership. Successfully mentored 200+ developers with 95% placement rate in top-tier technology companies.
